mapper.insert: insert into coupon (couponNum,categoryNum,couponCode,couponName,couponDiscount,startCouponDate,endCouponDate) values (coupon_seq.NEXTVAL,#{categoryNum},#{couponCode},#{couponName},#{couponDiscount},TO_DATE(#{startCouponDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{endCouponDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) from coupon
AND INSTR(couponCode, #{kwd}) > 0
AND INSTR(couponName, #{kwd}) > 0
AND INSTR(categoryNum, #{kwd}) > 0

SELECT c.couponNum,c.categoryNum,c.couponCode,c.couponName,c.couponDiscount,c.couponState, TRUNC(c.startCouponDate) AS startCouponDate, TRUNC(c.endCouponDate) AS endCouponDate, COUNT(DISTINCT mc.memberIdx) AS issuedCoupon, COUNT(CASE WHEN mc.use = 1 THEN 1 END) AS useCoupon FROM coupon c LEFT JOIN memberCoupon mc ON c.couponNum = mc.couponNum
AND INSTR(c.couponCode, #{kwd}) > 0
AND INSTR(c.couponName, #{kwd}) > 0
AND INSTR(c.categoryNum, #{kwd}) > 0
GROUP BY c.couponNum, c.categoryNum, c.couponCode, c.couponName, c.couponDiscount, c.startCouponDate, c.endCouponDate, c.couponState order by c.startCouponDate
select categoryNum, sort, categoryName from productCategory where sort = #{sort}
